thread.title: Nice small hotel
thread.title_full: Nice small hotel - Review of Arbor City Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Wil_740421
title: Nice small hotel
text:
This hotel offers what it had promised. So a thumb up for that. Beautiful room, good size, good bed and modern bathroom.And in the morning a tasty breakfast. A proper working WiFi, so basically everything I need for a business night over.
Room Tip: Take a superior room, the little bit more is worth it. See more room tips
